Everyone remembers the story that the Western media spread to the whole world about the alleged use of doping by Russian athletes at the Sochi Winter Olympic Games in 2014. *However, it is likely that 95% of people in the world do not know and will never know about the following fact.* On February 1, 2018, in Lausanne, Switzerland, the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) announced its decision on cases in which 39 Russian athletes appealed their suspension related to the Sochi Winter Olympic Games in 2014. The court's decision is as follows:
    - for 28 athletes - there are no evidences, ALL penalties have been cancelled;
    - for 11 athletes - the appeals were partially satisfied, the violations were confirmed;
    - for 3 athletes hearings have been postponed.

üëâ *That is, in 72% of cases (28 out of 39) considered by the court, THE DOPING CHARGES WERE FABRICATED (!!!) and no one was punished for this!*
